## Description {#details}

A proxy from a <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a></code> to an <code>SCC</code>.

When a module pass runs and triggers invalidation, both the CGSCC and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> analysis manager proxies on the module get an invalidation event. We don&#39;t want to fully duplicate responsibility for most of the invalidation logic. Instead, this layer is only responsible for SCC-local invalidation events. We work with the module&#39;s <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> to invalidate function analyses.

Definition at line 376 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/cgsccpassmanager-h">CGSCCPassManager.h</a>.
